adrFormatAddress: 353 Lexington Ave 4th floor Suite 400, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I want to say I am extremely thankful and grateful for Rob Brown and Henry for working with me on my Book Project. Rob went above and beyond dedicating himself to my book. If you ever link up with “Scribe Marketers” I would suggest you request Rob to be your Project Manager, you will be pleased all the way to the end!!!! DEDICATED, PLEASANT and TRUE FIGHTER for you!!!☺️

text.text: I want to say I am extremely thankful and grateful for Rob Brown and Henry for working with me on my Book Project. Rob went above and beyond dedicating himself to my book. originalText.text: Scribe Marketers are supposed to be editing my book for publishing and developing an app for me. I spent a huge amount of money on the app several months ago and have only seen an opening screen. The book has not been published I have not heard from them in over two weeks now. I am getting the feeling that I am being scammed.

text.text: Scribe Marketers are supposed to be editing my book for publishing and developing an app for me. I spent a huge amount of money on the app several months ago and have only seen an opening screen. The book has not been published I have not heard from them in over two weeks now. I am getting the feeling that I am being scammed.

originalText.text: Henry Patrick was my dedicated project manager for my manuscript. He was very helpful. I am totally satisfied with the work Ghostwriter Founders and Scribe Marketers did for me.

text.text: Henry Patrick was my dedicated project manager for my manuscript. He was very helpful. I am totally satisfied with the work Ghostwriter Founders and Scribe Marketers did for me.

originalText.text: The communication between the author and lead person was poor. The person who did the editing should not be editing. I had a multitude of mistakes from them. The team that I used said their office was in Chicago. They were very unprofessional and lacked communication skills. This has been the absolute worst situation I’ve been in. The book was supposed to be completed by June 16th and this is Aug 18th. Still waiting! This is a dam shame. My advice…. Choose another publishing company. I won’t make this mistake again!

originalText.text: Scribe Marketer provided me with excellent PR services for my book launch. They were able to secure media coverage and help me get the word out to a wider audience.
